summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6671 for the improvement of S. Raymond St. from 28th Ave. S. to approximately 280 feet east thereof; by paving, etc.; under Ordinance No. 105484, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a local improvement fund.
